acceptance_criteria: pnpm run build succeeds, outputs to server/static/, total gzipped size <70KB, index.html references hashed assets
closed_reason: Updated assetFileNames in vite.config.ts to use app-[hash] prefix for both JS and CSS. Build pipeline was already configured by task 5w6 - this task just ensured CSS naming matched the spec (app-[hash].css instead of index-[hash].css). Build outputs: index.html, assets/app-[hash].{js,css}, shoelace/icons/ with 2052 icons.
description:
Update vite.config.ts to:
1. Set build.outDir to '../server/static'
2. Configure asset naming: assets/app-[hash].js, assets/app-[hash].css
3. Set up Shoelace icon copying to dist/shoelace/icons/
4. Configure tree-shaking for cherry-picked Shoelace components
5. Add build script to package.json: pnpm run build

Verify build output structure:
server/static/
├── index.html
├── assets/
│   ├── app-[hash].js
│   └── app-[hash].css
└── shoelace/
    └── icons/

Test: pnpm run build && ls -la ../server/static/
title: Configure Vite build pipeline to output to server/static
